LanguageData.FibrousMechanites.label: cursed muscle enhancement
LanguageData.FibrousMechanites.description: A semi-beneficial curse which enhances the victim's strength, but also causes intense pain. Nobody knows from where this curse appears or where it goes but it is thought that it may be a small demonic gift for helping a demon.
LanguageData.SensoryMechanites.label: cursed sensory enhancement
LanguageData.SensoryMechanites.description: A semi-beneficial curse which enhances the victim's senses, but also causes intense pain. Nobody knows from where this curse appears or where it goes but it is thought that it may be a small demonic gift for helping a demon.
